caption.p: Hierarchical cluster analysis and heatmap of quantified volatile and phenolic compounds in the oils extracted from olive trees grown in three different soils (L: loam; CL: clay-loam; and, SL: sandy-loam) infected (Vd) and non-infected (control) by D- Verticillium dahliae. Numbers correspond to the VOO extracted from trees grown in each of five blocks in the experimental plot.
